name: The Da Vinci Cryptex 2
description:
The genial inventor is back with new logical enigmas written in a book!



Find the answers, unlock the Cryptex, and see what awaits you in the next level!


The Da Vinci Cryptex 2 is a brainteasing game with 50 unique riddles. The more you solve them, the harder the puzzles become

Warning: this IQ game may be addictive!


- 50 unique handcrafted puzzles
- Hints available (click the bulb button to get a hint)
- Astonishing graphics
- Captivating background music

If you're a fan of puzzles, word games, brain thinking, mind games, IQ logic riddles, and enigmas, The Da Vinci Cryptex is the game for you, have fun in your spare time!


XSGames is a solo indie game developer from Italy. I self-published the first Mystery Box chapter on the app stores in 2021 and got amazed by the awesome success it had with mobile game players.
Such results changed my life, so I hope you'll enjoy playing the Mystery Box escape room adventures as much as I love making them!
